title: Provides for implementation of domestic violence employee awareness and assistance policies by employers and grants disability benefits credit therefor
summary: Provides for the implementation of domestic violence employee awareness and assistance policies by employers and grants a disability benefits insurance premium credit to the employer for the implementation thereof.
actClause: AN ACT to amend the workers' compensation law, in relation to providing for the implementation of domestic violence employee awareness and assistance policies by employers and providing a disability benefits insurance premium credit for the implementation thereof
